description: Try our easy to follow Chicken BLT Roll with Avocado & Mayo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken BLT Roll with Avocado & Mayo
name: Chicken BLT Roll with Avocado & Mayo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Split rolls through the centre and spread bases with mayonnaise. Top with lettuce, bacon, tomato, chicken and avocado. Top with roll top and serve.
